pkgmetadata.longdescription: Volatility is the world's most widely used framework for extracting digital artifacts from volatile memory (RAM) samples. The extraction techniques are performed completely independent of the system being investigated but offer visibility into the runtime state of the system.

use.flag: support plugins that decrypt passwords, password hashes, etc.
